trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The burly researcher looks at you appraisingly.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the lightly built lab assistant.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_TODO_01<tab>Pick up the ore-filled crate.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the lightly built lab assistant and follow his lead.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the burly researcher.

TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_000<tab>You look strong, sturdy, and─most importantly─idle. Which is a wonderful coincidence, as I'm in need of a spare pair of hands. Let me explain.

TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_001<tab>I sent one of my younger colleagues off to the Aesthete's Tholos to organize a shipment of ore...but after a second glance at the order sheet, I realized why it was taking him so blasted long.

TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_002<tab>Seems the order was more than triple the size we usually handle─something to do with all these large-scale preparations, I suppose. And I can hardly expect that pup to shift it all on his lonesome.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_003<tab>Come and pitch in with the hauling, and I'll make it worth your while. What say you?
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_004<tab>Good. Many hands make light work─well, lighter, at least. Let's go.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_NEWRESEARCHER04187_000_010<tab>Please tell me you're the help I was promised...

TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_NEWRESEARCHER04187_000_011<tab>Oh, thank the stars! My supervisor came past not a moment ago and scooped up half the ore himself. I swear he's part forest troll... But even so, I don't think I can manage the rest without doing myself an injury.

TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_NEWRESEARCHER04187_000_012<tab>Listen, if I take this crate, do you think you could carry that other load? Once you have it settled into a comfortable grip, I'll lead us to where we need to go.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_NEWRESEARCHER04187_000_013<tab>Yes, that big box there full of ore. And don't ask me about carts─I put in a request <var 1A 02 /var>weeks<var 1A 01 /var> ago.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Commence hauling?
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Follow the lightly built lab assistant and try not to fall behind.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_SYSTEM_100_021<tab>You will have three minutes to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_NEWRESEARCHER04187_000_022<tab>I see you're no stranger to hauling heavy things about! Come on─let's get moving before my arms fall off!
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_NEWRESEARCHER04187_000_024<tab>Yes, um, I'll need you to actually bring the crate. You know, <var 1A 02 /var>physically<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_025<tab>Where's the rest of the ore? Did you leave it back in the Outer Circuit?
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_030<tab>That ought to do it. Come on back to the Archeion, and I'll pay you what you're owed.
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_NEWRESEARCHER04187_000_031<tab>Thanks, I can handle the rest from here─the worst of it is over!
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_NEWRESEARCHER04187_000_032<tab>Thanks, I can handle the rest from here─the worst of it is over!
TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_040<tab>I'm glad you came along when you did. I can't be hauling ore all day, and my colleague is not exactly built for hard labor.

TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_041<tab>The Aesthete's Tholos is where we store our mineral deposits, you see, and it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> our job to field and fill requests from our fellow researchers...

TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_042<tab>But we're not equipped to process orders of that quantity, especially if the Central Circuit keeps sending up requisition papers at the same frenzied pace.

TEXT_AKTKZA008_04187_GOODSHAPERESEARCHER04187_000_043<tab>We'll run out of stock before long─assuming our backs don't give out first. Anyway, you're not here to listen to me gripe. Take your wages, and good work!
